content: Remove my reminder of going to the gym.

You have the following reminders:

1. Buy a car
2. Buy a phone
3. Buy a new car
4. Going to school at 8 pm
5. Going to the gym at 9 pm

Please let me know if you would like to remove any of these reminders.
Remove my remainder going to the gym.
Your reminder "Going to the gym at 9 pm" has been successfully removed.
Move the reminder of going to school.
I'm sorry, but I need to know the new time for your reminder "Going to school at 8 pm" in order to move it. Please provide the updated time.
Remove the reminder of going to school.
Your reminder "Going to school at 8 pm" has been successfully removed.
